SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Levels

Class LevelParent

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Levels.LevelParent
Direct Known Subclasses:
BossLevel, DynamicLevel
public abstract class LevelParent extends Object
Superclass for level instances, handles all common level interactions Includes level transitioning, scene initializing and updating, object state updating etc.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LevelParent(double screenHeight, double screenWidth, int levelnumber)
    Constructs a LevelParent instance and initializes the game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelParent

      public LevelParent(double screenHeight, double screenWidth, int levelnumber)
      Constructs a LevelParent instance and initializes the game state.
      Parameters:
      screenHeight - The height of the screen.
      screenWidth - The width of the screen.
      levelnumber - The number of the current level.

      Ends the game with a win state, stopping the timeline and triggering the level change.

      Ends the game with a lose state, stopping the timeline, playing the game-over sound, and triggering the level change.
